title: Forbidden Forest Ritual Site Adventure #9
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ancient Ritual Clearing
rooms.description: A circular clearing deep in the forbidden forest. Ancient standing stones form a perfect circle around a central altar. Moss-covered symbols glow faintly in the moonlight. The air is thick with the scent of pine and something older, more primal. Carved totems watch from the tree line.

items.name: stone altar
items.description: A flat stone altar covered in ancient runes and dried herbs
items.text: Inscription: 'The ritual was performed by the Forest Keeper in the year of the witch trials. The sacred flame burns at the heart of the ancient oak. Only moonwater can break the forest's binding.'

items.name: hollow fallen log
items.description: A massive rotting log covered in mushrooms and moss

items.name: weathered parchment
items.description: Ancient notes written in faded ink
items.text: Ritual Notes: The binding ceremony was completed in the year 1692, during the dark times. The Forest Keeper sealed the power within the sacred grove. Three truths must be spoken to enter the inner sanctum.

items.name: carved stone box
items.description: A heavy box carved with forest symbols and a four-digit combination lock

items.name: ancient iron key
items.description: A heavy iron key with a wolf's head carved into the handle

items.name: wooden ritual chest
items.description: A chest bound with iron bands and a wolf-head lock

items.name: bundle of sacred herbs
items.description: Dried herbs tied with braided grass, used in ancient rituals

items.name: Forest Keeper's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal with detailed entries
items.text: I am the Forest Keeper, guardian of these woods. The ritual site's power flows from the ancient oak at the grove's heart. I have sealed the inner sanctum with three questions. Only one who understands the forest's secrets may enter.

items.name: circle of standing stones
items.description: Twelve ancient stones arranged in a perfect circle
items.text: Each stone is carved with a different symbol: moon, oak, wolf, raven, serpent, stag, bear, owl, fox, boar, crow, and thorn.

items.name: wooden totem pole
items.description: A tall totem carved with animal spirits

items.name: vial of moonwater
items.description: A small glass vial containing water that glows with silvery light

items.name: overgrown forest path
items.description: A narrow path leading deeper into the sacred grove

rooms.name: Sacred Grove
rooms.description: A mystical grove dominated by an enormous ancient oak tree. Its gnarled roots spread across the forest floor like veins. Fireflies dance in the air, and the sound of distant chanting echoes through the trees. A stone archway covered in vines leads to the inner sanctum.

items.name: ancient oak tree
items.description: A massive oak tree that must be thousands of years old. Its trunk is carved with countless symbols.
items.text: The carvings tell a story: 'Here burns the sacred flame, eternal heart of the forest. The Forest Keeper tends the fire. The ancient oak holds all power. Moonwater cleanses and releases.'

items.name: hollow in the oak roots
items.description: A dark hollow between the massive roots of the oak

items.name: bone talisman
items.description: A talisman carved from bone and hung on a leather cord

items.name: moss-covered shrine
items.description: A small shrine with offerings of flowers and stones
items.text: Offerings to the forest spirits. A plaque reads: 'The Forest Keeper protects us. The ancient oak gives us life. Moonwater purifies our souls.'

items.name: ritual circle
items.description: A circle of stones with ash from ancient fires

items.name: vine-covered stone archway
items.description: An ancient archway leading to the inner sanctum. Three questions are carved into the stone.

password_questions.question: Who guards the forest?
password_questions.hint: Check the journal and inscriptions around the ritual site

password_questions.question: Where does the sacred flame burn?
password_questions.hint: Read the altar inscription and the oak tree carvings

password_questions.question: What breaks the binding?
password_questions.hint: The altar inscription mentions what can break the forest's binding

rooms.name: Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: You have entered the heart of the ritual site! A sacred flame burns in a stone basin at the center of a circular chamber. The walls are covered in glowing runes that pulse with ancient power. Roots from the great oak above form a natural ceiling. The air hums with magical energy. A shaft of moonlight illuminates a path leading upward to freedom.

items.name: eternal sacred flame
items.description: A flame that burns without fuel, glowing with green and silver light

items.name: ritual stone basin
items.description: The basin holding the sacred flame, carved with protective symbols

items.name: ancient glowing runes
items.description: Magical inscriptions covering every surface
items.text: The runes tell of the forest's power: 'Here lies the heart of the ancient wood. The ritual is complete. The binding is sealed. The forest endures eternal.'

items.name: ceiling of oak roots
items.description: Massive roots forming a natural dome overhead, pulsing with life

rooms.win_message: You have reached the inner sanctum and witnessed the sacred flame! The ancient ritual site has accepted your presence. The forest's power flows through you as the moonlight guides you safely out of the forbidden woods. The mysteries of the ritual site are now yours to keep. You win!
